channel.title: Wine on Martin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Wine on Martin's Blog

item.title: Jamming with a Line6 foot pedal
item.description: I had the opportunity to sample a great studio-grade professional foot pedal from a company called Line6. The machine is called a POD XT Live and was lent to me for a few days by a friend. On the website the POD XT Live is described as an »uncomplicated, gig-ready tone machine that’s portable and adaptable to different real world stage and recording environments«. Well, it is truly impressive and quite complicated to a novice like myself.
